blogPost.excerpt: Join us for a weekly fireside chat with iconic product leaders: Feb 4: Manik Gupta: former CPO at Uber and product leader at Google Maps Feb 11: Jiaona Zhang, VP of Product at Webflow Feb 18: Sriram Krishnan, Previously at Snap, Twitter, and Facebook
blogPost.body: Join us for a weekly fireside chat with iconic product leaders: Feb 4: Manik Gupta: former CPO at Uber and product leader at Google Maps Feb 11: Jiaona Zhang, VP of Product at Webflow Feb 18: Sriram Krishnan, Previously at Snap, Twitter, and Facebook
blogPost.title: UserLeap: The Biggest Launch - Learn what makes or breaks a successful product launch
blogPost.author: Ryan Glasgow

localize.description: 加入我们，每周与标志性的产品领袖进行炉边聊天。2月4日：Manik Gupta，Uber前CPO，谷歌地图产品负责人 2月11日：张佳娜，Webflow产品副总裁 2月18日：Sriram Krishnan，曾就职于Snap、Twitter和Facebook。
localize.tagline: 了解成功的产品发布的成败因素

localize.description: 加入我們，每週與標誌性的產品領袖進行爐邊聊天。2月4日：Manik Gupta，Uber前CPO，谷歌地圖產品負責人 2月11日：張佳娜，Webflow產品副總裁 2月18日：Sriram Krishnan，曾就職於Snap、Twitter和Facebook。
localize.tagline: 瞭解成功的產品發佈的成敗因素

localize.description: 幸运萝卜是一个全方位的员工参与平台。⠀◾让员工互相认可，◾为员工的成就带来可见性，◾通过调查让员工的声音被听到，◾提供洞察力，提高员工的参与度。
localize.tagline: 让你的员工超强的参与度、认可度和感激度。

localize.description: 幸運蘿蔔是一個全方位的員工參與平臺。⠀◾讓員工互相認可，◾爲員工的成就帶來可見性，◾通過調查讓員工的聲音被聽到，◾提供洞察力，提高員工的參與度。
localize.tagline: 讓你的員工超強的參與度、認可度和感激度。
